title: Season's Greetings release from Fountain
content:
Hello everyone,

this year we teamed up with ourself and made you a little Christmas song.

[http://www.fountain.nu/jul06/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173317/http:/www.fountain.nu/jul06/ "http://www.fountain.nu/jul06/")

Have a long, relaxing holiday :-)

/peter
author: peterbruhn

comments.content:
Thanks Peter!  
Best wishes to you and your family!

ChrisL
Wow! That was really nice. Thanks Peter! Best wishes to you & yours.

The same to you both :)  
 Finally all gifts are bought, the open fire is lit, and the Christmas beer has been purchased. Have a great holiday.:-)

The Christmas Berr! Ah, now you really are ready :-)

ChrisL
